## Conversion.Converters.KeyedConverterOptions.keyConverter property

If present, `keyConverter` is used to convert the source object property names to keys in the resulting map or record.

**Signature:**

```typescript
keyConverter?: Converter<T, TC> | Validator<T, TC>;
```

## Remarks

Can be used to coerce key names to supported values and/or strong types.
